items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute & incredibly comfy. I Absolutely LOVE this sweater
items.body: I fell in love with this sweater from the moment I saw it & knew I had to have it. I probably would’ve ordered this in black, but I thought about it & decided the army green with black lettering would be perfect & it is. This sweater could not be more comfortable, it’s so soft right out of the package & aside from a few wrinkles it looks amazing. When you first put it on the corners & edges have a tendency to want to curl in bc that’s how knitted & crocheted sweaters act, but it starts to lay flatter overtime. I’m short & this sweater is actually not too long on me, it hits right where it does in the pictures yet it still has the comfy oversized fit that you can see in the pics too. The sizing of this seems spot on as well, I looked at the size chart & ordered based on the measurements there & I ended up with my perfectly oversized fit that looks awesome opposed to sloppy. The only thing it’s missing is pockets & some type of closing method. The closure I can figure out on my own. I plan on using a super oversized safety pin that I have from a much older cardigan, but not much I can do about pockets. If another version of this sweater is made, it should definitely have pockets & I would absolutely buy that version as well. The sweater is a nice thickness, but it also has a pattern that lets air through so probably not the best for cold & windy unless you’re layering a lot. The letters are super solid though, they remind me almost of letters on a letter jacket but not fuzzy & they seem to be on very well. They don’t seem like they would fall off. All around a great sweater with so much style & comfort. I highly recommend this sweater, it seems very well made, it’s so soft & comfortable, it’s super cute& can be worn with almost anything. Seriously the perfect fall sweater Read more
items.author: Jennifer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and baddie vibes this is your sign to get it!!
items.body: I bought this for an event and i will be wearing it all the time. I got the red and it is so beautiful. I’m normally a small top but ordered a M and it is perfectly oversized but not too baggy. Is it j crew quality? No. Is it super fun and look amazing, yes. It is soft and not itchy, I’m super sensitive to texture and this is fine with a tank under. I never leave a review unless it is outrageously good or horribly bad lol So yes, try it and you will 99% love it The 1% should stick to Nordstrom lol Read more
items.author: Melissa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Rock sweater rocks!
items.body: This sweater is warm amd comfortable. I love the length. Wears well with straight leg jeans. For a casual look, wear with ripped jeans. Read more
items.author: Shelly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars SUPER cute....but VERY BIG!
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: The sweater is really cute and really well made. I have gotten quite a few compliments on it. My issue is it's pretty big on me. I am 5'7 and 130 and ordered a small. An extra small would have been better. The color is beautiful and true to what I was expecting. The quality is good as well. It's been washed a few times and has done well (I put it in a laundry bag just to be sure it doesn't get caught on something). Read more
items.author: Amy Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars BUY THIS!
items.body: This sweater fits so nice! I threw it in the drier when I got it and it fluffed up and is so soft. I LLL❤️VE it! I am 5'10" 165# and I got a large- it is oversized and so CUTE. It's thick, made well but not heavy! It's comfy and warm... and the color I got is a wheat color- or camel?the color is nice and rich! Idk but I get compliments all the time! I pair it with a black slimming jump suit and over the knee boots that are the same color (camel) ... one gal asked if she could take a pic of me as long as she didn't get my face because she wanted to order the same outfit exactly as I had it lol. BUY THIS!!! It's worth every penny! Read more
items.author: Trista

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorite sweater
items.body: Love it! Versatile, stylish, comfortable, kick ass swag and fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Kathryn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cute, fits fine but wouldn't buy again due to the quality
items.body: This sweater is cute, the shipping was fast and I love the lettering on the back but the quality of this thing is horrible. I even used a fabric shaver, it didn't help ,this thing just for lack of a better word sheds and it just looks terrible. The lettering on the back was fine, if you buy this sweater be prepared to spend a lot of time shaving the fabric and still you're going to have a lot of pilling, I'd rather spend a little more money and get something better quality. It was a disappointment because I love the saying on the back. Read more
items.author: Nicole May

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy sweater. Love it
items.body: Love this sweater. It’s perfect to wear in the house on a cool day. While having your breakfast even. Very soft and cozy. I enjoy the color as well. It goes with everything Great value. And fits perfectly. Read more
items.author: Great item. Have to my aunt in her coffin. Everyone loved it. Very pretty.

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Sky Blue, Brown, Blue, Grey Blue, Army Green, Black, Coffee, Grey Pink, Dark Green, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
